full_summary:
===============

### Temporary Help Services

#### Tender Announcement

The Government of Canada invites suppliers to submit proposals for Temporary Help Services, specifically 2 Senior Special Advisors.

#### Tender Details

| Detail | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01016009 | Numéro de référence: PW-22-01016009 |
| Amendment Number | 1 | Nombre d'amendement: 1 |
| Solicitation Number | T8080-220305 | Numéro de sollicitation: T8080-220305 |
| Publication Date | December 5, 2022 | Date de publication: 5 décembre 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 19, 2022 | Date de clôture des propositions: 19 décembre 2022 |
| Amendment Date | December 6, 2022 | Date d'amendement: 6 décembre 2022 |

#### Eligible Suppliers

This tender is open to the holders of supply arrangement EN578-172870 under the following streams and categories:

* 13.9 - Special Advisor - Senior

This requirement is set aside for Aboriginal suppliers only in accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business (PSAB).

#### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is Transport Canada, located at:

330 Sparks St
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N5
Canada

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Hmaidan, Alexander
alexander.hmaidan@tc.gc.ca
613-558-5328

#### Attachments

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/9b3979edc2d139e7ba839eae15e43312/npp-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/f9fe15097b7eed3ae6fb6a7b7a8cb485/npp-fr.pdf

#### Important Dates

* December 19, 2022: Tender closing date
* Date to be determined: Expected contract start date

#### Notice URLs

* English: None
* French: None
